frameDefinitions: A particular Binding_principle is (or is not) operative, that is, any obligations, restrictions, and any other aspects of the Binding_principle are (or are not) in effect.
This frame contains adjectives and nouns that describe the truth or sincerity of communication.
An Agent manipulates a Fastener to open or close a Containing_object (e.g. coat, jar).

A Communicator processes some information (either from textual or real-world/perceptual sources) regarding a State_of_affairs into a concise form (a summary) that contains the essential content in briefer form, and communicates this summary to an Addressee, or records it in a Medium.
A Phenomenon, which may be an activity, state or object, is purposefully hidden from the awareness of a potential Cognizer.
A Whole, an entity with a substructure, is assessed for whether or not it has all the necessary parts that are defined for it or for an entity of its kind.
frameExamples: This law will only become in <t>effect</t> during the last three weeks of the year.
Evelyn was <t>candid</t> with me about the party.
Mary <t>closed</t> her coat with a belt.
Frank has already <t>summarized</t> some of the reactions on his weblog.
Few people would use ATMs if the content of their transaction was <t>secret</t> from their bank and there was no paper trail verifying the transaction. .
What happens after the PPB investigation is <t>complete</t>?
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is the law, contract, principle, or other (set of) obligations that is (or is not) operational.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is in effect.
The <fen>Place</fen> at which the <fen>Binding_principle</fen> is or is not operational.

The <fen>Speaker</fen> produces the <fen>Message</fen>, the truth or sincerity of which is at issue. It is normally expressed as the External Argument of predicative uses of the <t>target</t> word, or as the Nominal Head of prenominal uses.

<fen>Message</fen> is the communicative content whose truth or sincerity is at issue. This role does not normally co-occur with the other FEs in this frame. When it does occur, it is normally the External Argument of a predicative use of the <t>Target</t> word, or the modified Nominal Head in a prenominal use.

The <fen>Topic</fen> is the subject matter to which the <fen>Message</fen> pertains. It often occurs without the <fen>Message</fen> role in predicative uses of the <t>target</t> word. It is normally expressed as a PP Complement headed by 'about'.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the physical or abstract setting in which the <fen>Message</fen> is conveyed.

This role identifies the item that is closed by the agent with the fastener.
<fex name='Agent'>Lee</fex> <t>buttoned</t> <fex name='Containing_object'>his coat</fex>.
The Agent opens/closes the Containing-object.
This role identifies the fastener that the agent manipulates.
This role identifies the active zone of the container that may be expressed as the direct object of the target verb.
The time at which the <fen>Agent</fen> closes the <fen>Container_portal</fen> or the <fen>Containing_object</fen>.
The location where the closing event takes place.
The <fen>Communicator</fen> creates and communicates the summary of the Information.
The <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is summarized by the <fen>Communicator</fen>.
The textual or other <fen>Medium</fen> through which the <fen>Communicator</fen> summarizes.
The time at which the <fen>Communicator</fen> makes the <fen>Summary</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Communicator</fen> communicates.
The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the activity, state or object that is purposefully hidden from the awareness of a potential cognizer.
A period of <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is hidden from the awareness of potential cognizers.
The entity that is being assessed for having all its necessary parts or not.
The interval of time when the completeness of the entity is assessed.
listRoleExamples: Once <fex>the treaty</fex> is in effect, US port authorities and the Coast Guard will monitor compliance by checking any yacht 79 feet or longer.
All patent applicants and owners should be aware of the current uncertainty as to what patent fees will be in effect <fex>on October 1, 1998</fex>
This promotion is void <fex>in the state of Florida</fex>.
Evelyn made some candid remarks <fex>in French</fex>.
Marcus tied his shoe <fex>with the neon-green shoelaces</fex>.
They close the bank vault <fex>at precisely 5:35PM</fex>.
Shouldn't you have buttoned that <fex>in the bathroom</fex>?
There was stuff in there that was 'secret' <fex>in the 1980s</fex>, but has since become pretty common knowledge.
<fex>Our list of participants</fex> is still incomplete.
My journey to the dark side is <fex>now</fex> complete.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Glasgow Palestine Human Rights Campaign
